company.name: Chamunda Refrigeration
company.description: Ahmedabad's most trusted AC & refrigeration service provider since 2018. We bring 6+ years of certified expertise to every job — from installation to deep cleaning.

services.title: AC Installation
services.short: Expert fitting for all brands & tons
services.description: Professional installation of split, window, cassette, and inverter ACs. We handle all brands — Daikin, Voltas, LG, Samsung, Hitachi, and more. Proper copper piping, bracket mounting, and gas charging included.

services.title: AC Repair & Service
services.description: From compressor failures to PCB faults, we diagnose and fix all AC issues with precision. Our technicians carry original-grade spare parts for quick, reliable repairs that last.

services.title: Gas Refilling (Regassing)
services.description: If your AC isn't cooling properly, low refrigerant might be the cause. We offer precise gas filling using calibrated gauges — no overcharging, no shortcuts. All refrigerant types handled.

services.title: Deep Cleaning & Sanitization
services.description: Foam jet cleaning of indoor unit, outdoor unit, filters, evaporator coil, and drain pan. Anti-bacterial treatment kills mold and allergens. Your AC runs 15–20% more efficiently after a deep clean.

services.title: AMC – Annual Maintenance
services.description: Our Annual Maintenance Contracts cover scheduled servicing, priority breakdowns, and discounted parts replacement. Residential and commercial plans available. Peace of mind, all year long.

services.title: Commercial HVAC
services.description: We service cassette ACs, central air conditioning, ductable units, and VRF/VRV systems for commercial spaces. Scheduled maintenance contracts for offices, restaurants, hospitals, and factories.

testimonials.name: Rakesh Patel
testimonials.text: Same-day repair service was absolutely brilliant. Technician arrived within 2 hours, diagnosed the issue quickly, and fixed it at a fair price. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Priya Shah
testimonials.text: Took an AMC plan for my 2 ACs. The cleaning visit made a huge difference — AC cools much faster now and electricity bill dropped noticeably. Very professional team.

testimonials.name: Mehul Desai
testimonials.text: Gas refilling was done properly with pressure gauge, not guesswork. First time someone explained the whole process to me. Trustworthy service!
